discussion_comments.comment_body: This should be named `fileToModulesMap`. Should we also use `Set<ModuleRunnerNode>` rather than `ModuleRunnerNode[]` for consistency with `EnvironmentModuleGraph`?
better to call `cwd` as `base` here? So we avoid possible confusion with `cwd` not being `cwd` when modified.
